original_text: My Christian friends, I do not think that I have reached that place yet. But this is what I do: I do not think about past things that have already happened. Instead, I try hard to reach the things that are in front of me.
korean_text: 형제들아 나는 아직 내가 잡은 줄로 여기지 아니하고 오직 한 일 즉 뒤에 있는 것은 잊어버리고 앞에 있는 것을 잡으려고

sentences.original_text: I do not think that I have reached that place yet
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그곳에 아직 도달했다고 생각하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: But this is what I do
I do not think about past things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 과거의 일들에 대해 생각하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: to reach the things that are in front of me
sentences.korean_translation: 내 앞에 있는 것들에 도달하기 위해
